item.name: Collaboration

request.description: This operation retrieves the address book.

response.name: This section describes the default error response for this operation.
This section describes the 200 status response for this operation.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.

request.description:
This operation is used to leave an existing chat.

Note: Use empty JSON object as the request body.

response.name: This section describes the default error response for this operation.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.

response.name: This section describes the 204 status response for this operation. This response code indicates that the operation completed successfully.

request.description: This operation sends a message to an existing chat.

response.name: This section describes the default error response for this operation.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.

response.name: This section describes the 201 status response for this operation. This response code indicates that the message was sent successfully.

request.description: This operation invites a participant to an existing chat. The users can initiate a conference chat by inviting more users to an existing chat.

response.name: This section describes the default error response for this operation.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.

response.name: This section describes the 204 status response for this operation. This response code indicates that the operation completed successfully.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.
(Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.

request.description: This operation retrieves the participants of an existing chat. A maximum of 100 participants are retrieved in a single call.

response.name: This section describes the default error response for this operation.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.

response.name: This section describes the 200 status response for this operation.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the chat in Oracle Field Service.

request.description: This operation creates a new chat with another user, helpdesk or a conference chat with a group of users.

response.name: This section describes the default error response for this operation.
This section describes the 201 status response for this operation. This response code indicates that the operation completed successfully.
